attributes.action: Give the prefix Royal to Wootton Bassett
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
To repay the debt the country and the Government owes to the town of Wootton Bassett the town should get the Royal prefix.
The town honours our fallen armed forces and the Government could show this country that it honours our Forces and supports the town

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
